betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The §6Pattern Terminal§r allows you to §eaccess the patterns that you've set for auto-crafting§r and is the GUI you'd need to §esetup your crafting or processing patterns on§r.

To make the pattern, you'll need a Blank Pattern, ingredients and the result of the recipe. Put the Blank Pattern on the Pattern-shaped Slot and make sure the mode is based on your needs for the recipe. Put the needed items in the left Crafting Grid and the result on the right slot. You'd then need to put this Pattern in a ME Interface that's connected to either Molecular Assemblers for crafting or the machine needed for processing. Press "Encode Pattern" once you're done. Put the pattern in the appropriate ME Interface through an Interface Terminal or manually inserting one by hand.

To craft it, you'll need an §6ME Crafting Terminal§r and an §6Engineering Processor§r.
